nav.logoText: Korean Language and TOPIK Center in Tashkent

intro.title: Opportunity to study at South Korean universities with up to 100% scholarship
intro.desc1: We help you achieve TOPIK level 6 in 5 months
intro.desc2: Get a high TOPIK score and study or work in South Korea
intro.btnText: SIGN UP FOR A FREE LESSON
intro.linkBottom: Sign up for your first lesson for free!

ads.title: TOPIK academy is perfect for you if you:
ads.ads__card-text1: Want to speak Korean in a short time
ads.ads__card-text2: Want to learn Korean and build your career
ads.ads__card-text3: Want to get a TOPIK certificate and win a scholarship to prestigious Korean universities
ads.ads__card-text4: Want to study and work in South Korea
ads.ads__card-text5: Know Korean at an intermediate level and want to improve
ads.ads__card-text6: Have been studying for many years but havenâ€™t achieved results

results.title: Our students' results up to TOPIK 6

gks.title: Opportunity to win up to 100% scholarship at Korean universities
gks.info_text_2: The South Korean government's scholarship program (GKS) through the National Institute for International Education offers foreign students the opportunity to receive up to 100% full scholarship and a monthly stipend for undergraduate and graduate studies in Korea.
gks.info_text_3: What the GKS scholarship offers you
gks.list_item_1: Travel expenses to and from Korea are covered at the start and end of the program.
gks.list_item_2: Upon arrival in Korea, a one-time settlement allowance of 200,000 Korean won (approximately $157) is provided.
gks.list_item_3: Language course and university tuition fees are fully covered (only for master's and doctoral students)...
gks.video_desc: Learn all about the GKS scholarship in our specially prepared video interview! ...

contact.title: Got Questions?
contact.text: Leave your information and we will get in touch to answer all your questions.

courses.title: Register for a course that suits you

intensive.title: Intensive
intensive.text: Intensive course for those who want to master Korean in-depth, 1.5 hours per day for 6 days a week.

regular.title: Regular
regular.text: Regular Korean language classes, 1.5 hours 3 times a week.

individual.title: Individual
individual.text: For those who want to take individual lessons, 1.5 hours 3 times a week. Flexible schedule and personalized approach.

helps.title: We help successful graduates choose universities and win grants
helps.infoText: The TOPIK academy consulting team will assist you in choosing a university, obtaining a visa, and winning a grant.
helps.moreInfo: Sign up for a free consultation for more information!

modal.title: Leave your information
modal.text: Our specialists will contact you to provide more detailed information
modal.name: Your name

why.title: Why TOPIK academy?
why.card1Text: You will be taught by instructors with over 4 years of experience and TOPIK level 6
why.card2Text: We have free coworking zones for flexible studying, networking, and working on yourself
why.card3Text: The TOPIK academy team regularly organizes additional events for students
why.card4Text: You can participate in mock exams that are held regularly and track your level
why.card5Text: If you face difficulties with your studies, you will have a curator to help you
why.card6Text: We help our successful graduates with visa acquisition in South Korea, university selection, and scholarship applications
